hudmanager.configuration.title: HUD Manager Configs
Locates just above the hotbar, displays various texts.
hudmanager.configuration.AutoSaveIndicat: Locates in the bottom right of screen, displays autosaving.
hudmanager.configuration.BossBarScale.to: Locates at the top of screen, displays health of boss mobs.
hudmanager.configuration.ClosedCaptionSc: Locates in the bottom right of screen, displays sounds in game.
Locates in the middle of screen, displays the aim point.
hudmanager.configuration.DebugScreenScal: Displayed when F3 is pressed, displays various information.
hudmanager.configuration.PlayerListScale: Displayed while holding down Tab, displays player information.
hudmanager.configuration.ScoreboardSideb: Locates on the right of screen, displays objective information.
hudmanager.configuration.ScreenTitleScal: Locates in the middle of screen, displays various texts.
hudmanager.configuration.StatusEffectSca: Locates in the top right of screen, displays status effects.
